activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from Azure SQL database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT' and TABLE_NAME <> 'ProductModel'
select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

properties.description: Replace with the valid credential before running data flow job.
Replace with the valid credential before running data flow job.
Sample demo data flow to convert currencies showing usage of union, derive and conditional split transformation.

sources.name: USDCurrency
sources.script: source(output(PreviousConversionRate as double,Country as string,DateTime1 as string,CurrentConversionRate as double),allowSchemaDrift: false,validateSchema: false) ~> USDCurrency

sources.name: CADSource
sources.script: source(output(PreviousConversionRate as double,Country as string,DateTime1 as string,CurrentConversionRate as double),allowSchemaDrift: true,validateSchema: false) ~> CADSource

transformations.name: NewCurrencyColumn
transformations.description: Create a new calculated column from currency rate

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.description: Split the data on state to create 2 streams

properties.description: Sample demo data flow to transform movie data showing usage of derive transformation.

sources.name: Movies
sources.script: source(output(movieId as string,title as string,genres as string),allowSchemaDrift: true,validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

transformations.name: MoviesYear
transformations.script: Movies derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear
